timeline.bodyText: It would be great if these could be added as tag classed here.

replies.bodyText: I didn't add "date_on" because it has no mention of it in the OSM wiki, should it still be included?
replies.author: brianjor

timeline.author: Bentleysb

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            .anyMatch(tag -> tag.equals("construction")
          
          
            
                            .anyMatch(tag -> tag.equals(ConstructionTag.KEY.toString())
          
      
    
    
  

or if you pass in the atlas object:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            .anyMatch(tag -> tag.equals("construction")
          
          
            
                            .anyMatch(tag -> Validators.hasValueFor(object, ConstructionTag.class)
timeline.author: Bentleysb

timeline.bodyText: If the object is an Edge we will want to flag all the master edges with the same OSM ID (see InvalidTagsCheck for an example).
timeline.author: Bentleysb

timeline.message: Modified check if is valid construction
Added new tests, fixed old isConstruction tests
Replaced strings with *Tag.KEY, new requirements to pass gradlew check
